h: 45-year-old woman dies in accident on Ara-Arwal Road
sub_h: A 45-year-old woman died in a Road accident near Jamuni Tola on the Ara-Arwal Road when she was going to relieve herself in the field on Monday morning.

h: 5 of a wedding party die in Road accident
sub_h: Five members of a wedding party died on the spot and nine others were injured when the car in which they were travelling rammed into a stationary truck on a highway near Maranga police station in Purnia district on Saturday.

h: 3 of family die in Road accident
Three die in Road accident in Samastipur
sub_h: Three persons died and three others were severely injured while returning from a wedding procession under Singhia police station area in Samastipur district Saturday night.

h: 1 dead, ASP among four injured in Road accident in Patna
sub_h: A 20-year-old youth died on the spot while four policemen, including Paliganj ASP Awadhesh Saroj Dixit, were injured in a major accident on the highway connecting Bikram to Paliganj, in Patna district on Saturday. The accident took place around 11:30am when Dixit along with other cops was travelling in his official vehicle. The deceased was identified as Vimlesh Kumar of Faridpur village under Naubatpur police station area.

h: 42% of Road accidents in state took place on nat'l highways last yr: ADG
sub_h: ADG (headquarters) JS Gangwar on Monday said that 42.6% of the total Road accidents took place alone on national highways in 2022.

h: Five of a wedding party dead, 9 injured after car rams into truck near Bihar's Purnia
sub_h: Five members of a wedding party died on the spot and nine others injured when a car in which they were travelling rammed into a stationary truck on a highway near Maranga police station in Purnia district on Saturday.

h: Bihar: Five die in Arwal Road accident
sub_h: Five persons died on the spot while several others sustained injuries in a Road accident near Khokhri village in Arwal district Friday night. The deceased were travelling in an autorickshaw, which collided head-on with a truck near the Khokhri Mor.

h: Good Samaritans feted for helping accident victims
sub_h: District magistrate (DM) Chandrashekhar Singh on Thursday honoured 12 Good Samaritans for rushing the victims of Road accidents to hospitals in ‘golden hour’ and saving their precious lives. They were awarded with Rs 5000 cash, a citation and a shawl each.

h: 4 people, 150 sheep killed in accident involving two trucks in Maharashtra's Hingoli district
sub_h: Four people and 150 sheep were killed after a truck carrying the animals hit another truck in Maharashtra's Hingoli district early on Thursday, a police officer said. The accident took place at Malegaon phata on Nanded-Kalamnuri road at around 4am, he said, adding that traffic movement on the route was disrupted for some time.

h: 12% jump in Road accidents, fatalities up by 16% in Bihar
sub_h: Fatalities due to Road accidents in the state started showing upward trend after a decline in 2020 because of travel restrictions owing to Covid-19 pandemic.

h: Road accidents claim 15 lives in Bihar in 48 hours, many hurt
sub_h: At least 15 people were killed and several others injured in separate Road accidents in Vaishali, Jamui, Saharsa, Purnia, Araria, Munger and Kishanganj districts in the last 48 hours.

h: 5 dead, 8 injured in truck-auto collision in Maharashtra's Nanded district
sub_h: Five persons were killed and eight were injured in a collision between a truck and an autorickshaw in Maharashtra's Nanded district on Thursday, an official said.

h: 4 of a family among five dead in Road accident in Bihar's Vaishali
sub_h: Five persons, including four members of a family, died after their car collided with a truck near Chikanota on NH-28 (Tajpur-Muzaffarpur road) in Vaishali district on Saturday.

h: Man, wife & daughter killed as truck rams into auto on Ara-Patna road
sub_h: A 38-year-old man, his wife and their daughter died, while their three children sustained injuries in a Road accident on the Ara-Patna road on Friday afternoon. The incident occurred when a speeding truck coming from the opposite direction rammed into the auto rickshaw they were travelling in near the under construction Kulhariya Toll Plaza under Koilwar police station of the Bhojpur district.

h: Two dead, 11 hurt in Jamui Road accident
sub_h: Two persons, including a two-year-old girl, died and 11 others sustained injuries when the autorickshaw they were travelling in collided head-on with a speeding truck on the Jamui-Lakhisarai Road in Jamui district on Sunday morning. The incident took place around 5am near Amba village under Town police station area, police said. The deceased were identified as Jaddu Rajak (30), the autorickshaw driver, a resident of Tilakpur village and Nisha Kumari (2), daughter of Rajkumar Yadav.

h: 2 dead in Road accident in Patna
sub_h: A driver of a pick-up van and his helper died when their vehicle collided head on with a school van on Bailey Road flyover in Patna on Friday morning.

h: Minor boy, his father die in B’pur accident
2 killed, 2 injured as SUV runs over them in Patna
sub_h: As many as two persons were killed while two others suffered injuries after a speeding SUV ran over many pedestrians on the Bihta-Ara National Highway-30 in Patna.

h: 4 dead, 2 injured in Gopalganj accident
Maharashtra registers 24,000 Road accidents till September this year, 11,000 dead
sub_h: Maharashtra registered 24,360 Road accidents in the nine months from January to September this year, a marked rise of 3,127 accidents over the corresponding period last year.

h: Vaishali Road accident: Truck driver was intoxicated, cops say
sub_h: The police on Monday confirmed that the truck driver Lalu Kumar, who ran over his vehicle on 15 people in Vaishali district and killed eight, was driving under the influence of alcohol. The accused has been arrested in an injured condition and admitted to the Sadar Hospital for treatment.

h: 4 die, 2 injured in Gopalganj Road accident in Bihar
sub_h: Four persons died on the spot while two others sustained injuries in a Road accident under Shripur Thana outpost in Gopalganj district on Thursday night.

h: Bihar: 2 die, 1 injured in Gopalganj Road accident
sub_h: Two persons were killed after their car rammed into the boundary wall of a private school on the Hathua-Mirganj main road under Hathua police station area in Gopalganj district around 3.30am on Sunday.

h: Youth and minor girl from Delhi killed in accident on Maharashtra's Samruddhi
sub_h: A 19-year-old youth and 14-year-old girl from Delhi were killed in a suspected Road accident on the Samruddhi Super Expressway. The deceased youth has been identified as Aseem alias Buchan Abbas of JJ Colony, Delhi. The fatal accident took place on Tuesday evening near the Sawangi Bridge, and the area falls within the jurisdiction of the Phulambri Police Station of Aurangabad Rural. On learning about the accident, police teams went to the spot and shifted the bodies to the Government Medical College and Hospital. The teens' families were informed of the accident, but due to the delay in their arrival to claim the bodies, the police got the bodies shifted to Mortuary-Based Cold Storage. Police said they are in touch with their Delhi counterparts to check if any missing complaints or a case of kidnapping had been registered with them. Sub-Inspector Damodar Waghmare, who is the investigation officer, said the police are also trying to ascertain if the two Delhi teens were trying to cross the Super Expressway when they were run over by a speeding goods truck or did they take any extreme step. A truck bearing a Tamil Nadu registration number has been seized and a case has been registered against its

h: 6,626 killed in Road accidents last year in Bihar, most victims youth
sub_h: In 2022, 6626 people died in Road accidents in Bihar. In 2021, 5476 people got injured in Road accidents, and 7660 people were killed in Road accidents. In 2020, 8639 people were killed in Road accidents. State transport commissioner Seema Tripathi said that the majority of victims are in the young age group, especially college students who drive vehicles carelessly or overtake other vehicles or speeding. "During the road safety week from January 11 to 17, awareness drive will be held in all districts of Bihar through radio jingles, nukad natak' and short movies to sensitise commuters to drive safely by following motor vehicles act," she said. "The department is also taking measures to curb s by identifying not only the black spots but also the vulnerable points black spots are such areas where 10 accidents and 10 deaths took place within a year and the vulnerable points are those where more than three persons died and less than 10 accidents took place within a year. With the help of the nhai road construction department and rural works department, we are trying to identify the problems in such black spots and vulnerable points across the state. Measures like speed breakers, rumble strips, signage, zebra crossing and street lights are being taken as per

h: Vaishali accident: Truck driver was drunk, say police
sub_h: The police on Monday confirmed that the truck driver Lalu Kumar, whose vehicle ran over at least eight persons and injured several others in Vaishali Sunday night, was drunk. He was arrested in an injured and inebriated condition and admitted to the Sadar Hospital for treatment.

h: Woman dies in Road accident
sub_h: A 55-year-old woman, Sushila Devi, was killed and her husband, Ramashray Yadav, got injured when a speeding bus hit their two-wheeler near Sanhauli fuel station under the Naubatpur police station area in Patha on Sunday.

h: 2 killed, 20 injured as bus rams into truck in Bihar's Vaishali
sub_h: At least two persons were killed and 20 others injured after a bus they were travelling in rammed into a stationary truck in Bihar's Vaishali district.

h: Bihar: 7 die in separate Road accidents in Begusarai
sub_h: Seven people, including a woman, were killed in separate Road accidents under various police stations of Begusarai district on Wednesday.

h: Six killed in Road accident in Maharashtra's Beed
sub_h: Six people were killed after a car and a tempo collided head-on in Maharashtra's Beed district on Sunday morning, police said. The accident took place around 5.30am on Manjarsumba-Patoda highway, they said.

h: Patna: Woman dies in Road accident
sub_h: A 55-year-old woman, Sushila Devi, was killed and her husband, Ramashray Yadav, got injured when a speeding bus hit their two-wheeler near Sanhauli fuel station under the Naubatpur police station area in Patha on Sunday.

h: Bihar: Three killed in Road accidents in Begusarai
sub_h: Three persons, including a shopkeeper, died in separate Road accidents under Bachhwara police station area of Begusarai district on Saturday night.

h: 5 killed, 7 hurt in Vaishali Road accident
sub_h: At least five people were killed and seven others injured when a speeding truck rammed into a roadside eatery in Vaishali district on Wednesday. The incident occurred around 1.30pm near Bahuara Chowk on state highway-49 under the Patepur police station area in the district.

h: Bihar records over 7% decline in Road accidents
sub_h: The number of Road accidents in the first three months of the year (January to March) has declined by 7.73% in the state when compared to the same period in 2021. The number of road fatalities also came down by 2.

h: Ensure quick medical care to Road accident victims, min tells officials
sub_h: State transport minister Sheela Kumari on Thursday instructed the officers concerned to ensure that the Road accident victims get immediate medical care during the “golden hour”, the first 60 minutes following an injury.

h: Ensure quick medical care to Road accident victims, says minister Sheela Kumari
sub_h: State transport minister Sheela Kumari on Thursday instructed the officers concerned to ensure that the Road accident victims get immediate medical care during the “golden hour” period, the first 60 minutes following an injury.

h: Siwan boy lynched after Road accident
sub_h: A 16-year-old boy was lynched and his fawas seriously injured by the mob after their SUV hit a band group in Sevatapur Mouja village under Mairwa police station in Siwan district on Sunday. After the collision, a scuffle was broke out between Sunil Manjhi and member of the band group.

h: Five killed in Road accident in Bhagalpur, seven injured
sub_h: Five people were killed and seven other got injured when a auto-rickshaw carrying a wedding party collided head on with a truck on the NH-31 in Naugachia in Bhagalpur district of Bihar on the intervening night of Monday and Tuesday.

h: Bihar: 4 killed in Road accident in Valmikinagar tiger reserve
sub_h: Four people of a family were killed and as many critically injured after a car rammed into a tree in Valmikinagar Tiger Reserve in Bihar's West Champaran district.

h: Bihar: Six die in Madhepura, Gaya Road accidents
sub_h: Altogether six people were killed in two separate Road accidents in Madhepura and Gaya districts in last 24 hours.

h: Three women among six die in Road accident in Bihar's Kaimur
sub_h: Six persons, including three women, died while three others were critically injured after their e-rickshaw collided with a truck on NH-219 near Amwaman under Chaipur police station area in Kaimur district late Sunday evening.

h: 10-year-old among 7 killed in Road accident
sub_h: Seven people were killed on the spot in an accident caused by the head-on collision of a speeding four-wheeler (a Cruiser) and a truck in Ambajogai of Beed district. Of the seven deceased, six belonged to the same family.The accident took place around 10.

h: Four of a family killed in Road accident
sub_h: Four members of a family, including two women, were killed in an accident that took place on the Solapur-Dhule National Highway on Friday morning after the car they were travelling in rammed into a trailer carrying tractors.

h: 13% decline in Road accidents in Bihar: Government
sub_h: State transport minister Sheela Kumari on Thursday said road safety was a sensitive issue and all the departments should make efforts together to reduce the Road accidents.

h: Workers from Bihar killed in Nagaland Road accident had left to eke out a living
sub_h: Bihar CM Nitish Kumar on Sunday announced an ex gratia payment of Rs 2 lakh each to the next kin of four construction workers of Katihar’s Korha block who were killed in a Road accident in Nagaland’s Chumoukedima district on Saturday.

h: Bihar: Five dead, 10 hurt in Buxar Road accident
sub_h: At least five persons died and ten were critically injured in a head-on collision between a Scorpio and a bus near Kritsagar village under Krishna Brahma police station area in Buxar district on Saturday evening.

h: Bihar CM Nitish Kumar announces ex-gratia of Rs 2 lakh to kin of 8 people killed in Road accident near Barabanki
sub_h: Both the ill-fated buses, which originated from Bihar’s Sitamarhi and Supaul (Darbhanga) towns, were on their way to the national capital. All eight deceased and 18 injured persons hail from Bihar.

h: Two killed, one injured in Road accident in Beed
sub_h: Two persons were killed and one injured when their car hit a divider on Dhule-Solapur Highway in Maharashtra's Beed district, police said on Saturday.

h: Two die, 4 injured in Patna as car runs over them
sub_h: Two persons died and four more were critically injured after a car ran over them on NH-30 service lane near Sorangpur under Ramkrishna Nagar police station area in Patna at around 5.45am on Tuesday. The car was coming from Dhanbad in Jharkhand and was going to Saguna Mor in Danapur.

h: Woman robbed in Patna, girl dies in Road accident
8% fall in Road accidents in Bihar, but 0.3% rise in fatalities
sub_h: The Road accident cases in the state declined by 8.68% but the fatalities increased by 0.3% in the first six months of 2021, as compared to the period in 2019. The state transport department figures also revealed around 10% rise in the number of people getting injured in 2021, compared to 2019. The figures of 2020 were not taken into account because of complete lockdown from March 23 till Unlock 1.0 in May.

h: Bihar: Six of family killed in Katihar Road accident; PM Modi, CM express grief
sub_h: Six members of a family were killed when their car rammed into a truck on a highway in Bihar's Katihar district on Tuesday, police said. The mishap took place on NH-31 in the Kursela Police Station area when the deceased were returning to their home in Samastipur from Purnea where they had gone to finalise a marriage, SHO Aman Raj said.

h: Bihar: Two doctors among 7 killed in Gaya
sub_h: Seven people – two doctors and five staff members of a paediatric hospital here – were killed on Friday when their car collided head on with a truck on Dobhi-Chatra highway.

h: 3 killed in Road accident in Bihar's Bettiah town
sub_h: Three persons, believed to be from the same family were mowed down by a tanker in West Champaran district on Monday. The visibility in the area was low due to heavy fog and the driver is said to have been drunk.

h: Woman and son killed in Road accident in Bihar's Rohtas
sub_h: A 35-year-old woman and her five-year-old son were crushed to death by a speeding vehicle in Bihar's Rohtas district on Saturday, police said.

h: Crime, Road accidents down after liquor prohibition: Bihar CM Nitish Kumar
sub_h: Strongly defending liquor ban a day before his high-level review meeting on the issue in the wake of a series of hooch tragedies recently, CM Nitish Kumar on Monday said the crime rate and number of Road accidents have come down in the state after enforcement of total prohibition.

h: Maharashtra: 9 injured in Road accident in Latur
sub_h: Nine people were injured in an accident involving three vehicles in Maharashtra's Latur district, police said on Tuesday. The accident took place around Monday midnight near Hadolati village in Ahmedpur tehsil when a jeep driver apparently lost control over the wheels.

h: Bihar: 6 killed, 7 injured in separate Road accidents
sub_h: In the first incident, a daily wager Sukhdev Chauhan (65) and Bahadur Kumar (25) were killed after a truck rammed head on the van in which they were travelling on NH-31 under Mufassil police station area in Nawada at around 6am on Saturday.

h: 6 die in separate Road accidents
Bihar: 3 of a family die in Road accident
sub_h: A transporter, his wife and their minor daughter died as the SUV in which they were travelling fell into a roadside field after overturning several times on NH-30 near Saidpur village under Salimpur police station area of rural Patna Friday morning.

h: Covid patient flees Jalna hospital, dies in Road accident
Bihar: Home guard jawan dies in Road accident
sub_h: A home guard jawan on night patrolling was crushed to death by a speeding pickup van on SH-90 near Dak Bungalow under the Baikunthpur police station area in Gopalganj in the wee hours of Tuesday.

h: Five killed in Road accident in Bihar's Begusarai
sub_h: Five persons were killed after their car hit a road divider and overturned, and a truck rammed into it in Bihar's Begusarai district, police said on Sunday. The accident took place on the National Highway-31 near Lakho village in the Maffosil police station area on Saturday evening, they said.

h: Five of a band party die in Katihar Road accident
sub_h: Five persons were killed and 5 others sustained grievous injuries when an autorickshaw collided head-on with a sand-laden truck on the national highway 31 near Sameli primary health centre at Kurshela in the district in the wee hours of Monday.

h: Bihar: Man along with wife, daughter killed in Road accident in Salimpur
Bihar: Nine killed, two injured in Road accident in Gaya
sub_h: Nine persons were killed and two others injured when a speeding truck rammed into the two auto-rickshaws on the national highway-2 (popularly known as Grand Trunk (GT) Road) near Amas town in Bihar’s Gaya district on Monday, a police officer told TOI here.

h: Bihar: 5% fall in Road accidents in second half of 2019
sub_h: There was 5% decline in the number of accidents and 6% fall in accident deaths in the state in the second half of 2019, said state transport secretary Sanjay Kumar Agarwal on the concluding day of the Road Safety Week on Friday.

h: Aurangabad: Road accident fatalities reduce by 65%
sub_h: In a meeting through video conference on Monday, Aurangabad Municipal Corporation (AMC) administrator and municipal commissioner Astik Kumar Pandey said that Road accident fatalities have reduced by 65 % over the last four months

h: Bihar: Couple, children travelling to Saharsa from Delhi killed in Road accident
7 killed in Road accidents in Bihar
sub_h: Seven people, including three of a family, were killed in Road accidents in Rohtas and Darbhanga districts on Sunday.

h: Poll duty-bound SSB jawan dies in Road accident in Bihar
sub_h: The incident took place near Dumra Chowk in Kotwa police station area on Monday night when 34-year-old Sashastra Seema Bal jawan Shailesh Kumar Singh was going to a polling booth in Kalyanpur constituency in East Champaran district on his motorcycle, a police officer said.

h: Father-son duo among four die in two Road accidents in Bihar
Two die in Nalanda Road accidents
sub_h: At least two persons, including the son of a mukhiya, were killed and another sustained critical injuries in two separate Road accidents in Nalanda district on Monday.

h: Bihar: Six killed in Road accidents in Arwal and Nalanda
sub_h: At least six people were killed in two separate Road accidents in Nalanda and Arwal district in the last 24 hours on Monday. While five people died in Arwal district late on Sunday night, a 65-year-old man was crushed to death by a speeding truck under Chandi police station in Nalanda district on Monday morning.

h: Three killed, six injured in a Road accident in Bhojpur
sub_h: Three persons including two women were killed and six others injured when the SUV in which they were travelling overturned in Bihar's Bhojpur district on Tuesday, police said.

h: 2 killed, 1 hurt in Road accident
Five killed in two Road accidents in Supaul
sub_h: At least five people were killed and two others received serious injuries in two Road accidents in Supaul district on Tuesday morning.

h: Nine migrant labourers killed in Road accident in Bihar
sub_h: Bhagalpur, May 19 () Nine migrant labourers were killed on Tuesday when the truck carrying them overturned in an attempt to avert a head-on collision with a bus in Bihar's Bhagalpur district, police said.

h: Eight migrants from Bihar killed in Road accidents
sub_h: As many as eight Bihar migrant workers were killed and 31 others injured, nine of them critically, while they were on their way home in two separate Road accidents in the past 24 hours.

h: Patna: Intermediate examinee dies in Road accident
AIIMS-Patna felicitates Road accident survivors
sub_h: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences-Patna (AIIMS-P) on Wednesday felicitated 10 persons who lost their limbs after undergoing amputation during treatment there after Road accidents. It was a part of the road safety week being organised by the institute.

h: Road accident fatalities up 14.8% in Bihar
sub_h: The state has witnessed 14.8% increase in Road accident deaths in the first six months (January to June) of this year when compared to the same period last year. The cases of Road accidents and injuries have also increased by 10.3% and 9.1%, respectively.

h: Seven killed, 15 injured in Road accidents in Bihar
Eight killed in two separate Road accidents in Aurangabad
sub_h: In Aurangabad district, eight people were killed and 12 were seriously injured in two separate Road accidents during the last 24 hours.

h: 6.33 per cent increase in Road accident deaths in Bihar
sub_h: The number of deaths in Road accidents in Bihar increased by 6.33% last year compared to 2018, according to the latest data of state transport department.

h: Bihar: Three buses set on fire after father and son killed in Road accident
sub_h: Angry villagers set three private buses on fire on Muzaffarpur-Hajipur NH-22 after a man and his son were killed in a Road accident in Bihar's Vaishali district on Tuesday, police said.

h: Four killed in bus-tempo collision in Maharashtra
sub_h: At least four people lost their lives and around 15 others were injured on Tuesday when a bus collided with a tempo in adjoining Beed district in central Maharashtra, police said.

h: Maharashtra: 8 killed, 8 injured in truck-taxi collision
sub_h: Eight persons were killed when a truck collided with a taxi in Jalgaon district of Maharashtra on Monday, police said. The accident took place near Pimpalkotha village in Erandol tehsil on the Mumbai-Nagpur highway, police said.

h: Two killed, 11 injured in separate accidents
sub_h: Two persons were killed and 11 sustained injuries in separate Road accidents in the state in last 24 hours.

h: Bihar: Sub-inspector dies in Aurangabad accident
sub_h: A police sub-inspector Amit Kishor Rajak died in a Road accident near Khaira village under Mufassil police station area in Aurangabad district on Sunday night. Three other policemen also received serious injuries in the accident.

h: Patna girl among 4 die in two Road accidents
Gaya admn concerned over Road accident deaths in district
Road accident claims two lives in Patna
sub_h: Two people, including a retired Patna University teacher Dr Lal Narayan Sharma (78), died after a car rammed into a roundabout at Rajendra Nagar under Kankerbagh police station area in the city on Tuesday.
